sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import './FoodItem.css' import { assets } from '../../assets/assets' import { StoreContext } from '../../context/SotoreContext' function FoodItem( {id, name, price, description,image}) { const [itemCount, setItemCount] = useState(0) const {cartItems,addToCart,removeFromCart} = useContext(StoreContext); return (
{!cartItems(id) ?addToCart(id) } src={assets.add_icon_white} alt= '' /> :
removeFromCart(id)} src = {assets.remove_icon_red} alt= 'Remove icon' />

{itemCount}

addToCart(id)} src = {assets.add_icon_green} alt="" /> }

{name}

{description}

Price: ${price}

) } export default FoodItem
